thread.title: My new fave hotel in NYC
thread.title_full: My new fave hotel in NYC - Review of Hotel 17, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: polina_pj
title: My new fave hotel in NYC
text:
Had really great experience of staying in this hotel - chose it based on good reviews and impressive - in a good way! - price per night. I was aware that rooms are not huge - but very light and airy, and that shower/toilets are common - all of this didn't matter. Hotel 17 is my new fave hotel in NYC - it's quiet (traffic clanking and honking does not count), it's clean, beds are amazing, it smells nice - yes, it's very important as well. I stayed here in February - didn't feel cold at all, bathrooms were always accessible, never had to wait.
Also had a nice view of nearby buildings and roofs - very New York-y)
Staff was nice, I had my interactions with them only when I checked in and out. And of course another thing to point out - location, everything that you need is close by.
My verdict - will be def back.
